about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Collect parts, set up your workshop, start production, and dive into trade!

Scrapworks Simulator Demo begins with you as a scrap collector. Explore your surroundings to find hidden parts in the streets, factories, and abandoned areas, and combine the collected parts in your workshop to create products.

This demo version aims to provide a tutorial-focused experience for players.

  • Collect scrap and transform it into usable products

  • Explore abandoned areas

  • Build and manage your workshop

  • Sell products in your store

Features

  • Collecting: You start the game as a simple scrap collector.

  • Collect Parts: Explore the environment and find hidden parts in the streets, factories, or abandoned areas.

  • Build Your Workshop: Set up your workshop buildings in any area you choose.

  • Craft: Combine the collected parts in your workshop to turn them into usable tools and objects.
